attributes.action: honour York actor Berwick Kaler for creating laughter and joy in these difficult times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that Berwick Kaler, the Dame at York's pantomime for the last 30 years, should receive an honour in recognition of his incredible contribution to the arts and to the city of York

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
